meanings: (재미로 즐겨 하는 일) hobby, interest, pastime

vlive.korean: 취미? What do you do in your free time? 듣기 View video OSEN : Weeekly 위클리, 상큼 발랄 소녀들이 왔다 #연습실챌린지 01
vlive.english: What do you do in your free time?

vlive.korean: [취미?] 드라마 보기? [What do you do in your free time?] Watching drama series? 듣기 View video OSEN : Weeekly 위클리, 상큼 발랄 소녀들이 왔다 #연습실챌린지 01
vlive.english: [What do you do in your free time?] Watching drama series?

vlive.korean: 잘 그려요 - 잘해서 - 맞아요, 취미보다는 특기? She's good at it. - Yes. - Right. It's more of her strength than her hobby. 듣기 View video OSEN : Weeekly 위클리, 상큼 발랄 소녀들이 왔다 #연습실챌린지 01
vlive.english: She's good at it. - Yes. - Right. It's more of her strength than her hobby.

vlive.korean: 저 요즘 취미요? My hobby these days. 듣기 View video iKON : 짜자잔
"요즘 새로운 취미 생겼나요?" "What's your new hobby"? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 휴닝이의 공작시간

examples.korean: Her hobbies are music, reading and handicraft. 발음듣기 그녀의 취미는 음악, 독서, 수공예이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Her hobbies are music, reading and handicraft. 발음

examples.korean: My parents always took an interest in my hobbies. 발음듣기 우리 부모님은 나의 취미에 항상 관심을 가지셨다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: My parents always took an interest in my hobbies. 발음

examples.korean: Music is a passion with him. 발음듣기 음악은 그가 열중하는 취미이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Music is a passion with him. 발음

examples.korean: I only play jazz as a hobby. 발음듣기 나는 취미로 재즈를 연주할 뿐이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I only play jazz as a hobby. 발음

examples.korean: My hobbies include reading and painting. 발음듣기 내 취미에는 독서와 그림 그리기가 포함된다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: My hobbies include reading and painting. 발음
